toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: A user-defined Grouping for Purchased Parts. Created for all direct purchased parts when Inventory Commodity Code is created. Manually created for Service and Indirect items.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Commodity Code
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_comcod__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: A user-defined value used to describe the Commodity Code.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Description
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_desc__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Not Applicable
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Default PO Inventory Quantity
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_dfltpoinvqty__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Subject to Withholding Tax
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_dowht__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The Inspection Order Template to be used when creating Inspection Orders for PO Items using this PO Commodity Code, although it may be overriden on a given PO Item to a different value.

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This value defines the type of purchasing item associated with this item group. The choices are: Direct (including Sub-contract), Indirect, Outside Operation and Service.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Item Type
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_itemtype_pl__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocomcod__c.rstk__pocomcod_itemtype_pl__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>This is the type of item: ‘D’ is direct purchases; ‘I’ indirect material or ‘V’ for service. Note: while the POITEM_TYPE can be ‘S’ for subcontract and ‘P’ for direct purchases and ‘O’ for outside operation, the POCOMCOD_ITEMTYPE will only be ‘D’ as an all encompassing value for Direct purchases. IF ‘V’ for Service, then see POCOMCOD_SERVICETYPE which denotes how the service is to be charged: ‘A’ ($$ Amount for Service is specified on the requisition) or ‘H’ (Number of Hours specified for Service) or ‘D’ (Number of Days specified for Service) or ‘M’ (Number of Months specified for Service) (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This value defines the type of purchasing item associated with this item group. The choices are: Direct (including Sub-contract), Indirect, Outside Operation and Service.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Item Type</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Direct Purchases</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Direct Purchases</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Indirect Material</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Indirect Material</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Service</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Service</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Outside Operation</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Outside Operation</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The number days expected to convert a Requisition to a Purchase Order for an Item associated with this item group. MRP includes this number when calculating the initial release date.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lead Time, Req Convert
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_ltreqcnvrtpo__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The number of days it is expected that the Vendor requires to have an item associated with this item group available to ship once a PO is received by the Vendor.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lead Time, Vendor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_ltvend__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Organizational Department that will be the default for items using this PO Commodity Code.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Organizational Department
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_orgid__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocomcod__c.rstk__pocomcod_orgid__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Organizational Department that will be the default for items using this PO Commodity Code.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Organizational Department</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syorg__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>PO Commodity Code</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>PO_Commodity_Code</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: If checked, this checkbox indicates that over-receipts are to be allowed for an Item associated with this item group. If not checked, the po line will need to be adjusted to the actual receipt quantity to receive more than originally ordered.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Over Receipt Indicator
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_overrcptind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Determines how the PO Line Price is set for auto-created purchases. If value is 'Enter New Price', the system uses the user-defined 'PO Price' on the Approved Item Vendor record or PO Item record; if 'Use Last Price', the 'Last PO Price' is used.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: PO Price Option
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_popriceind_pl__c

If value is 'Enter New Price', the system uses the user-defined 'PO Price' on the Approved Item Vendor record or PO Item record; if 'Use Last Price', the 'Last PO Price' is used.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>PO Price Option</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Enter New Price</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Enter New Price</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Use Last Price</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Use Last Price</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This field specifies the decimal precision for Quantity in which purchases for items associated with this item group are expressed. For example, entering '2' here would allow a quantity of 2.75.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Qty Decimals
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_qtydecimal__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Represents the Buyer responsible for an item associated with this item group.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Buyer
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_respbuyer__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocomcod__c.rstk__pocomcod_respbuyer__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>The field identifies the individual responsible for BUYING the items assigned to this commodity. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Represents the Buyer responsible for an item associated with this item group.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Buyer</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__syusr__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>PO Commodity Code</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>POCOMCODs</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The weighting factor is used to determine a new Standard Cost based on Current Cost . This multiplier is used to identify how much of the new Standard Cost is based upon the Current Cost. The 2 Weight Factors (this plus Historical) must add up to 1.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Current Costs Weight Factor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_scfctrcurprice__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is a weighting factor used to determine a new Standard Cost based on PO history . This multiplier is used to determine how much of the new standard cost is based upon historical usage. This factor plus Current Costs Weight Factor must equal 1.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Historical Costs Weight Factor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_scfctrhstprice__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Determines the types of charges allowed where the Item Type is Service. Valid values are 'A' for Dollar Amount, 'H' for Hourly Rate, 'D' for Daily Rate and 'M' for Monthly Rate. Flat rate service charges use the value 'A'.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Service Type
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_servicetype_pl__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocomcod__c.rstk__pocomcod_servicetype_pl__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Only applicable if the POCOMCOD_ITEMTYPE is ‘V’ for Service ‘A’ – Dollar Amount ‘H’ - Hourly Rate ‘D’ – Daily Rate ‘M’ – Monthly Rate If the POCOMCOD_ITEMTYPE is not ‘V’ then this field is null. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Determines the types of charges allowed where the Item Type is Service. Valid values are 'A' for Dollar Amount, 'H' for Hourly Rate, 'D' for Daily Rate and 'M' for Monthly Rate. Flat rate service charges use the value 'A'.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Service Type</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Daily Rate</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Daily Rate</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Dollar Amount</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Dollar Amount</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Hourly Rate</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Hourly Rate</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Monthly Rate</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Monthly Rate</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: A factor used to determine a possible new Standard Cost based on PO history. A negative value (less than 1, i.e. -.2 for -20%) reduces the value and a positive value (i.e. .3 for +30%) increases it. Historical and Current combined must equal '1'.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Std Cost Markup/Down
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_stdcostmrkupdwn__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This value indicates whether the Simulated Purchase Price on the Inventory Standard Cost record for items associated with this item group will be set manually (value = M - Manual Entry) or through an automated process (value = C - Calculate)
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Std Cost Update Indicator
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__pocomcod_stdcostupdind_pl__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__pocomcod__c.rstk__pocomcod_stdcostupdind_pl__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>The value in this field will initialize the POITEMCST_STDCOSTUPDIND record whose POITEM_ITEM = POITEMCST_ITEM (for the same div) and whose POITEM_COMCOD is equal to the POCOMCOD_COMCOD This field can be ‘M’ or ‘C’ or null. If the value of this field is ‘M’, then this means that the POITEMCST_STDCOSTUPDIND will be set to ‘M’ on a POITEMCST record add. If this value of this field is ‘C’ or null, then this means that the POITEMCST_STDCOSTUPDIND will be set to ‘C’ or null on a POITEMCST record add. This field can be changed but it will not change the associated POITEMCST records The purpose of the POITEMCST_STDCOSTUPDIND field is to provide the system with the edit criteria as to how the POITEMCST_STDMTLCOST will be updated. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This value indicates whether the Simulated Purchase Price on the Inventory Standard Cost record for items associated with this item group will be set manually (value = M - Manual Entry) or through an automated process (value = C - Calculate)</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Std Cost Update Indicator</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Calculate</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Calculate</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Manual Entry</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Manual Entry</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>
